channel.title: I am new, and I d'ont know what i'm doing
channel.description:
Hey there. My name is Anders, and i have a few questions. :) First up, i have downloaded moparscape.. yes. I can look at my skills and take off my pickaxe, and mine the ore i am facing. But. when i try to move, i always frezes, and the program gets shut down. I have heard so much cool about it, and it looks cool!(for SURE!)
And another thing. i see you are making models.. pretty sweet! I dont know anything about making a sword, or adding it to the game. i cant even play the game.
So i am really happy to see this forum, looks so cool! All, thank you.
Anders.

item.title: I am new, and I d'ont know what i'm doing
item.dc:creator: @I_Own_A_Mac I Own A Mac
item.description:
@I_Own_A_Mac wrote:

Hey there.
My name is Anders, and i have a few questions.
First up, i have downloaded moparscape… yes. I can look at my skills and take off my pickaxe, and mine the ore i am facing. But. when i try to move, i always frezes, and the program gets shut down. I have heard so much cool about it, and it looks cool!(for SURE!)

And another thing. i see you are making models… pretty sweet!
I dont know anything about making a sword, or adding it to the game. i cant even play the game.

So i am really happy to see this forum, looks so cool! All, thank you.

Anders.
